title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 524/96 of 26 March 1996 fixing the compensation for Community bananas marketed in 1995 and the unit amount of the advance for 1996 and derogating from Regulation (EEC) No 1858/93 as regards the time limit for payment of the balance of the aid
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 524/96 of 26 March 1996 fixing the compensation for Community bananas marketed in 1995 and the unit amount of the advance for 1996 and derogating from Regulation (EEC) No 1858/93 as regards the time limit for payment of the balance of the aid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The compensation provided for in Article 12 of Regulation (EEC) No 404/93 for Community bananas covered by CN code ex 0803, excluding plantains, marketed fresh during 1995 shall be:
(a) ECU 22,51 per 100 kg for the period January to February;
(b) ECU 27,18 per 100 kg for subsequent periods.
2. The unit amount of the advance for Community bananas marketed from 1 January to 31 October 1996 shall be ECU 19,03 per 100 kg. The security relating thereto shall be ECU 9,51 per 100 kg.

Notwithstanding Article 10 of Regulation (EEC) No 1858/93, the competent authorities of the Member States shall pay the balance of the compensation for 1995 within two months of publication of this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
